short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for finding blogs that have comments enabled

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a discovery tool that you can run in your browser that will help you find blogs on which you can comment, using a variety of "footprints".

There are several benefits that you can achieve by making relevant, topical, and meaningful comments on authority blogs:

1. Direct traffic
2. An authoritative backlink (great for SEO)
3. Attention of an authority in your industry

You can also use this tool to open the door to guest posting on authoritative web sites.
